required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Electric Field Navigated 1hz Rtms for Post-stroke Motor Recovery Trial
clinical_study.official_title: A Prospective, Multi-center, Randomized, Sham-controlled Trial to Determine the Therapeutic Effects of Navigation Guided 1 hz Rtms Administered to the Contralesional Hemisphere as Adjuvant to Task-oriented Rehabilitation in Patients With Ischemic Stroke

brief_summary.textblock: A prospective, multi-center, randomized, sham-controlled, blinded study combining active Nexstim NBS-guided 1Hz rTMS or sham-rTMS targeting the healthy hemisphere with standardized task oriented rehabilitation will be conducted in patients with post-stroke motor impairment of the upper limb. The therapy will be provided for 6 weeks and primary outcome assessed 6 months later.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 6 months after end of treatment

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline to 6 months after end of treatment
Baseline to 6 months after end of treatment
Baseline to 6 months after end of treatment

arm_group.description: Intervention: Device: NBS-guided rTMS + task-oriented rehabilitation
Intervention: Device: NBS-guided Sham rTMS + task-oriented rehabilitation

intervention.description: Nexstim NBS guided active rTMS + standardized task-oriented therapy
Nexstim NBS guided sham rTMS + standardized task-oriented therapy

facility.name: Rancho Los Amigos National Rehabilitation Center
Burke Medical Research Institute, Weill Cornell Neurology
